titleSection.title: Crypto Case investigation solutions
titleSection.description: Take complete control over the access, filtering, and visualization of large data using an intuitive and user-friendly graph interface.

socialMedia.address: 200 Spectrum Center Dr,  Suite 300. Irvine CA 92618

infoSection.title: Utilize Universal Tracing
infoSection.subtitle1: Trace between addresses and entities, enabling quick macro decision-making as well as the capacity to delve down into particular fund movements—crucial for legal proceedings.
infoSection.subtitle2: TRM also makes it possible to see flows between unplotted graph parts, making it easy to locate and identify fund movements.
